abstract: Kenya Wildlife Service announces fatal shooting of 13-year-old male lion called Mohawk by wildlife officers after it wandered from Nairobi National Park; lion, a favorite of tourists, was shot after it injured bystander when officers tried to capture animal alive.

headline.print_headline: Kenya Wildlife Rangers Kill Lion Upset by Crowd
headline.main: Mohawk, a 13-Year-Old Lion, Is Killed by Kenya Wildlife Rangers

snippet: The male lion was shot by wildlife officials several times after he knocked a man off a motorcycle near Nairobi National Park.
lead_paragraph: The male lion was shot by wildlife officials several times after he knocked a man off a motorcycle near Nairobi National Park.
